Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Guided Configuration Widgets This package contains classes that represent SWT widgets, for the creation of a guided config wizard.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ISelectionEventListener An ISelectionEventListener can be used to receive selection events from widgets.
ISWTWidget This is a base interface that all widgets should implement for convenience.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMementoWidgetController This is the base interface for all WidgetControllers that need a memento path to a toplevel memento or memento attribute.
AbstractTableAction The SWTTable allows to add new table actions to the toolbar of the table.
AbstractTableRowCellEditorFactory This class shall be overwritten, if different CellEditors per row are needed.
AbstractTableRowValueConverter This is a row aware implementation of a ValueConverter.
AbstractTreeTableAction The SWTTreeTable allows to add new tree table actions to the toolbar of the tree table.
AbstractTreeTableRowCellEditorFactory A TreeTableRowCellEditorFactory can be used in a SWTColumnDescription for a SWTTreeTable to create different CellEditors for each row.
AbstractTreeTableRowValueConverter This is a row aware implementation of a ValueConverter.
AbstractWidgetController This is the controller interface for a guided config widget used for communication with the guided config engine.
BooleanValueConverter This ValueConverter implementation converts all forms of boolean values ("","0",""NaN","false","False","FALSE","no", "No", "NO","off", "Off", OFF", "1", "true", "True", "TRUE", "yes", "Yes", "YES", "on", "On", "ON").
CellEditorFactory A CellEditorFactory is used by a table column to provide a customized CellEditor for cells in a SWTTable or SWTTreeTable.
ComboBoxCellEditorFactory A ComboBoxCellEditorFactory is used for editing enumeration cell values via a ComboBox.
DCtxtTreeviewer The DCtxtTreeviewer.create(Composite) creates and returns a composite which shows DCtxt in a tree (in the same way, the search view does it).
FloatValueConverter Handles conversion of float values in decimal and scientific notation.
IntegerValueConverter Handles conversion of integer values in decimal, hexadecimal (0x...), octal (\\0...), binary (n...) form.
SWTBrowser A label area which is able to render HTML as well as plain txext.
SWTBrowserController This class represents the controller for a SWTBrowser.
SWTButton This class represents a Button GUI widget.
SWTButtonController This is the controller implementation for the SWTButton GUI widget.
SWTCheckBox This standard widget represents a checkbox.
SWTCheckBoxController This is the controller implementation for the SWTCheckBox GUI widget.
SWTColumnDescription A Table Column Description defines the type, width, name, mementoId, tooltip and defaultvalue of a table column.
SWTComboBox This standard widget represents a combo box.
SWTComboBoxController This is the controller implementation for the SWTComboBox GUI widget.
SWTGroup This standard widget represents a group that layouts other widgets.
SWTGroupController This is the controller implementation for the SWTGroup GUI widget.
SWTLabel This standard widget represents a label.
SWTLabelController This is the controller implementation for the SWTLabel GUI widget.
SWTTable This standard widget represents a table.
SWTTableController The SWTTableController provides data access and integration into the Guided Config Framework for the SWTTable .
SWTTableController.AbstractRowFilter This class can be implemented to provide a filter that allows to only show specific rows in the table.
SWTText This standard widget represents a text or number entry.
SWTTextController This is the controller implementation for the SWTText GUI widget.
SWTTreeColumnDescription A TreeTable Column Description defines the type, width, name, mementoId, tooltip, defaultvalue of a table column and the default icons for the different hierarchies of this tree column.
SWTTreeTable This standard widget represents a tree table.
SWTTreeTable.ModelChange A ModelChange instance is used by the SWTTreeTable.refresh(Collection) method to signal which rows have been change in the model in which way.
SWTTreeTableController This class implements the controller for a SWTTreeTable.
SWTWidgetLayoutData This layout data is used for widgets of the guided configuration.
ValueConverter A ValueConverter is used to convert between text, numbers etc. entered by the user or shown to the user and the format in which the text is internally stored.
 

Enum Summary
AbstractMementoWidgetController.ValidationSeverity Severity for AbstractMementoWidgetController.getValidationSeverity(List)
SWTTable.SortFlags SortFlags determine the sort order of the table
SWTTreeTable.ModelChangeType Descibes the type of a change used in SWTTreeTable.ModelChange.
ValueConverter.NumberFormat Describes the format in which numbers are shown in the GUI.
 

Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form Description

Guided Configuration Widgets

This package contains classes that represent SWT widgets, for the creation of a guided config wizard.

The basic widgets creatable via the WidgetFactory are:

  • SWTCheckBox: A checkbox widget
  • SWTCombo: A dropdown widget that can be of type String, Integer or Float
  • SWTGroup: A grouping widget with three different styles
  • SWTLabel: A label that can be used to describe other widgets
  • SWTTable: A table widget, whose columns are described via SWTColumnDescriptions
  • SWTText: A text widget that can be of type String, Integer or Float

The enumeration TextFormat of the WidgetFactory holds static variables, that shall be used to specify types in the WidgetFactory create methods. When creating a custom widget, two parts have to be extended/implemented:

  • ISWTWidget: Interface for the gui part of the widget
  • AbstractWidgetController: Abstract implementation of the controller part
